sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para: This is the gr-vocoder package. It contains all available vocoders in GNU Radio. The Python namespaces is in gnuradio.vocoder, which would be normally imported as:
See the Doxygen documentation for details about the blocks available in this package. The relevant blocks are listed in the Voice Encoders and Decoders group.
A quick listing of the details can be found in Python after importing by using:
